summary: A commandâ€‘line utility that downloads a DIT (Diffusion Image Transformer) checkpoint, extracts its encoder, decoder, and transformer components, and repackages them into a Hugging Face Diffusers pipeline (including scheduler and autoencoder) for downstream use.
business_intent: Enable developers to migrate existing DIT model weights into the Diffusers ecosystem, simplifying deployment, inference, and integration with other diffusion tools.
